mapper.sql: select sr.id, sr.resourceId, sr.`name`, sr.description, sr.url, sr.permission, sr.parentId, sr.type, sr.priority, sr.icon, sr.`status`, sr.create_time, sr.update_time from sys_resource sr
mapper.select: select url, permission from sys_resource where 1=1 and url is not null ORDER by priority ASC

select DISTINCT r.permission from sys_resource r LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource rr ON r.id=rr.resourceId LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on rr.roleId = ur.roleId WHERE 1=1 AND ur.userId=#{userId} and r.permission is not null and r.permission!='' and r.status=1
select CONCAT(sr.id,sr.permission) as permission FROM sys_resource sr LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr on sr.id = srr.resourceId where 1=1 and srr.roleId =#{roleId} ORDER BY sr.parentId,sr.priority
select sr1.* , sr2.name as parentname from sys_resource sr1 LEFT join sys_resource sr2 on sr2.id=sr1.parentId where sr1.id =#{id}
select count(sr2.id) from sys_resource sr1 LEFT JOIN sys_resource sr2 ON sr1.id=sr2.parentId and sr2.status=1 where sr1.id=#{id}
